name: Diane Rivera
title: budtender
coverLetter: My name is Diane Rivera. I am 21 years old currently seeking an opportunity to grow in the cannabis industry. I believe that I am the best candidate for this position because of my extensive customer service and my ability to adapt to any situation. I have a passion for success and goal oriented demeanor that would push me to accomplish my set tasks. Also, with my personable character I can work well and communicate with others to contribute to team efforts. In all that I do I would strive to advance the company, and I feel that my previous work experience proves that. I am willing to start as soon as needed. I appreciate it. For further information feel free to contact me at (323) 237-0202. Thank you for your time.
experience:
7Heaven, 5527 S central ave Los Angeles, CA  - Budtender

October 2017- December 2017

  • Grew as an individual by learning and providing great customer service on a daily basis.
  • Gained personal knowledge on keeping composure under pressure, situation resolving, remaining professional and also accommodating customers with payment procedure.
  • Consulted patient on different strains and help fulfill their medical needs

Original Green Bear, Los Angeles, CA - Budtender

June 2016- October 2016

  • Became informed on the variety of products and brands available for patients
  • Heavily populated dispensary with long shifts while keeping a positive attitude  

Mr. Nice Guy, Los Angeles, CA - Budtender

September 2015- October 2015

  • Obtained much knowledge on the right terminology of cannabis to be able to explain
  • Besides affiliating with patients, also provided maintenance around the dispensary

Green Stop Collective, Huntington Park, CA - Budtender

April 2015- July 2015

  • Experienced in dealing with patients and helping fulfill their medical needs
  • Differentiate types of strains and explain their effects
additionalInfo:
• Experience with Microsoft Office -Word & PowerPoint
  • Prioritizing and organizational skills
  • Excellent problem solving and communication skills, with a focus on customer service
  • Familiarity with Point Of Sales software
  • Mental math skills
  • Able to work with little to no supervision
  • Bilingual (Spanish/English)
